about_the_game:
Explore the spectral city of Havenbrook, now shrouded in darkness and mystery.

Every step you take reveals fragments of a larger story, a tale of tragedy, loss, and dark forces lurking in the shadows.

But beware, you are not alone. Something or someone knows your every move and seeks to obstruct your path to the truth. Will you survive long enough to unravel the mystery and free yourself from this endless trap?

This is an experience that will leave you breathless, a harrowing descent into the darkest recesses of the human psyche. Confront the unknown and discover if you have the strength to overcome the trials that await you.
detailed_description:
Feature List

・You are not alone - An unrelenting AI adversary lurks in the shadows, and being caught by it is a fate you desperately want to avoid. Will you choose to hide,
or will you muster the courage to confront this digital nemesis?"

・Piece it together - Read letters, find diaries, and examine the precious mementos of a broken family to understand the terrible events that led you here.

・Deception is around the corner - Uncover the secrets hidden within the town of Ashes Hollow by collecting clues scattered throughout the city while
discovering the tragedy haunting the protagonist.

・Light and dark - The power of Unreal Engine 5 renders a photorealistic environment with dynamic lights and shadows that can dazzle you or plunge you into darkness.


Just Updated

At the moment, we are working on full support for the Xbox Controller, which will be available in the final version of Shadows of Deceit.

name: Shadows Of Deceit

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)/Windows 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1500X, Intel Core i7-4770K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 with 4GB VRAM / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti with 4GB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: AMD Radeon RX 470 (4 GB), AMD Radeon RX 6500 XT (4 GB), NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 (4 GB), NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti (4 GB)
  • Additional Notes: Estimated Performance (Setting Performance Priority): 1080p/45 fps. Frame rate drops may occur during more complex scenes.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)/Windows 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600X, Intel Core i7-8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700 / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT (8 GB), AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT (8 GB), NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 SUPER (8 GB), NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 (8 GB)
  • Additional Notes: Estimated Performance (Setting Performance Priority): 1080p/45 fps. Frame rate drops may occur during more complex scenes.

short_description: Shadows of Deceit is a next-gen horror and psychological thriller game developed with Unreal Engine 5. While you are getting a chill down your spine with the impressive story and realistic locations, you will also witness the mystery behind Janet's story.
